title: John Oliver | Putin Rattles World with Nuclear Threat as Trump Calls Him Smart Again: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Vladimir Putin rattling the world by raising the alert status of Russia's nuclear forces as Republicans gathered for the Conservative Political Action Conference and refused to condemn Trump for praising Putin.

Then, John Oliver talks about his interview with Seth right before the city shut down, his wardrobe and backdrop for his show and his favorite things about Late Night.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
